column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////The food is really good
column2: but the wait and just OKAY service is why I gave it 3 stars. I'd visit again just because the food really is amazing. I love their skillets
column3: and the pancakes are phenomenal. But I'm huge on customer service and if you're working for tips
column4: well... you should always have a pleasant attitude :)
